REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0073 reute d f BC-CYBERTEK-<CKCP>-FORMI 03-02 0046

TEXT.TITLE: CYBERTEK <CKCP> FORMING NEW DIVISION
TEXT.BODY: Cybertek said it is forming a General Products division which will be located in Dallas. The new division will market personal computer software products targeted at the Fortune 500 companies, Cybertek said. Reuter
